remarks: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for operation value, analogous to ~ nfov .  To prove a deduction version of this analogous to ~ nfovd is not quickly possible because many deduction versions for bound-variable hypothesis builder for constructs the definition of alternative operation values is based on are not available (see ~ nfafv ). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
nfaov.2 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfaov.3 $e |- F/_ x F $.
nfaov.4 $e |- F/_ x B $.
nfaov $p |- F/_ x (( A F B )) $.
